value.description: SHOPPING: If you're only going to invest in one pair of shoes this year, we suggest starting early. Forget trainers or ballet flats, we're still swooning over Taylor Swift's Aquazzura platforms!

value.description: Prince Harry, Rob McElhenney, and Glenn Howerton. Courtesy of Prince Harry/Instagram Rob McElhenney gave fans a glimpse of his 2023 highlights while ringing in the new year, including a milestone moment with Prince Harry.

value.name: King Charles III’s Reported Support of Prince Andrew Is ‘Not a Great Look’ for Royal Family
value.description: On Wednesday, Jan. 3, documents from Ghislaine Maxwell’s court case were released and approximately 170 people associated with the late sex offender, Jeffrey Epstein, were named in those files. As expected, Prince Andrew ‘s name was listed and now, King Charles III starts 2024 with another family controversy .

value.name: Meghan Markle celebrates major business news - details
value.description: Meghan Markle started 2024 off with business celebratations as Clevr Blends, in which the Duchess is a stakeholder, began stacking products in US-based shopping brand Target, with three of their super lattes hitting the shelves.

value.name: King Charles doesn't put in enough 'effort' to see his grandkids Archie and Lilibet, expert claims
value.description: The King has only met Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's two children Archie and Lilibet on a handful of occasions due to his estranged relationship with the Sussexes.

value.name: Meghan Is "Furious" Over Royal Family's Treatment of Fergie, Insider Claims
value.description: A royal expert claims that Meghan Markle is "furious" that the royals treat her differently than Fergie, ex-wife of Prince Andrew.

value.name: Why Travis Kelce Isn’t Going With Taylor Swift to the Golden Globes Despite Being in L.A.
value.description: Travis Kelce will be in Los Angeles on Sunday but not to attend the Golden Globes as Taylor Swift’s plus-one, according to Page Six. The singer is nominated for the show’s Cinematic and Box Office Achievement award for her Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour concert film. If she wins, it would be her first Golden Globe.

value.name: Meghan Markle's mum Doria moves in with her and Prince Harry to support them during 'tough time'
value.description: Doria Ragland has moved into the Sussexes' guesthouse on the grounds of their Montecito mansion to support the former royal couple after a difficult year, according to an insider.

value.name: River Island's satin slip skirt with a stretchy waistband that hides unwanted bloating now £17
value.description: The khaki skirt has been made from a soft, satin fabric cut to a maxi length. It features a stretchy elasticated waist that makes the skirt is comfortable to wear all day, especially if you are prone to bloating after the lunch.
